# x-content-share

The `<x-content-share>` component description


Using the `<x-content-share>` component description.

```html
<x-content-share ...>
</x-content-share>
```


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                   | Type                  | Default                |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------- | --------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `headline` | `headline` | Headline for the share        | `string`, `undefined` | `undefined`            |
| `text`     | `text`     | The textual body of web share | `string`, `undefined` | `undefined`            |
| `url`      | `url`      | The URL we are sharing        | `string`, `undefined` | `window.location.href` |
